Hotels.Name: Ponderosa Motor Inn
Hotels.Description: Located on the Trans-Canada Highway, this Golden motel is situated between the Rocky and Selkirk mountain ranges. Golden town centre is 5 minutes' drive away. Free WiFi access and cable TV are provided in every room at the Ponderosa Motor Inn. They are equipped with a refrigerator and include bathroom amenities. A children’s playground are located on site at the Ponderosa Inn. There is also an outdoor patio with BBQ facilities.

Hotels.Name: Sophia Hotel Kyiv
Hotels.Description: Sophia Hotel Kyiv features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Kyiv. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as St. Volodymyr's Cathedral, St. Michael's Golden-Domed Monastery, and Khreshchatyk Metro Station. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

Hotels.Name: Khreschatyk Hotel
Hotels.Description:
Khreshchatyk Hotel is located in Kiev, 200 meters from Maidan Nezalezhnosti Metro Station. It offers a fitness center, free private parking and a bar. Guests can make use of concierge services. There is an ATM and free Wi-Fi on site. The front desk is open 24 hours a day, and food and beverages can be delivered to the room. There is a currency exchange desk.

The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, desk, kettle, fridge, minibar, safe and private bathroom with shower. Some rooms have a kitchenette with a microwave. Each room at the Khreshchatyk Hotel comes with bed linen and towels.
